trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.5v.last(#1)}<4.480 | {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.5v.last(#1)}>5.536
trigger.name: +5 V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.5vsb.last(#1)}<4.480 | {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.5vsb.last(#1)}>5.536
trigger.name: +5VSB Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.12v.last(#1)}<10.706 | {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.12v.last(#1)}>13.250
trigger.name: +12 V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.vbat.last(#1)}<2.928 | {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.vbat.last(#1)}>3.648
trigger.name: VBAT Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.vtt.last(#1)}<0.824 | {Template IPMI Supermicro X8DTL-3F:ipmi.system.vtt.last(#1)}>1.320
trigger.name: VTT Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}
